metadata.title: CVE-2023-45195 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Adminer and AdminerEvo are vulnerable to SSRF via database connectionfields. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to enumerate oraccess systems the attacker would not otherwise have access to. Adminer isno longer supported, but this issue was fixed in AdminerEvo version 4.8.4.

criterions.comment: adminer package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
